showScoreExcerpt:
"McBurney’s love of anthropology and huge respect for his subjects shines through. Each audience member is lost in their own sonic world, in a crowd of others. It’s a stunning communal and personal epiphany, but it’s almost too much, too heady. Part of McBurney’s genius is to reel things in a little bit...As the effects subside, we’re left with a new understanding of the limits of technology, as well as its strengths."
